components.description:
A lowercase letter i, enclosed in a rounded square or circle. Implemented in apps or websites to indicate that help or further information is available.

May be used as a logo for tourist information signage in a town or city.
components.title: Information Source

description:
A lowercase letter i, enclosed in a rounded square or circle. Implemented in apps or websites to indicate that help or further information is available.

May be used as a logo for tourist information signage in a town or city.
title: Information Source

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 1999, with most being given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: A lowercase letter i, enclosed in a rounded square or circle. Implemented in apps or websites to indicate that help or further information i http://emojipedia.org/information-source/
emoji_net_data.name: information

bn:00089724v: Impart knowledge of some fact, state or affairs, or event to

bn:00082481v: Give help or assistance; be of service
To give assistance or aid to.

bn:00043634n: A service that provides information and assistance to the users of a computer network
A point of contact between product users and technical support
An individual or team of support professionals that provide technical assistance for an organization's network, hardware devices, and software.
A help desk is a resource intended to provide the customer or end user with information and support related to a company's or institution's products and services.

bn:00046705n: Sequence of symbols that can be interpreted as a message by a subject
Information is the result of processing, manipulating and organizing data in a way that adds to the knowledge of the person receiving it.
Things that are or can be known about a given topic; communicable knowledge of something.
All facts, ideas or imaginative works of the mind which have been communicated, published or distributed formally or informally in any format, or the knowledge that is communicated or received.
Knowledge acquired through study or experience or instruction
